data.description: allows creation and use of 3-D vectors
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was created for science and engineering applications.
    It allows the usual vector operations (dot product, cross product),
    plus some operations in analytical geometry (calculating normal
    vectors of planes from points), conversion from IJK or ai + bj + ck
    (string) notation to the mathematical representation, and a function
    that calculates the vector necessary to bring an arbitrary number of
    vectors into equilibrium. I believe this can be a very useful module
    for scientists and engineers (and students of same) who have an
    interest in Perl (or it might get them interested in Perl :) )
